duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform routine maintenance, inspections, and repairs on a diverse fleet of vehicles, ensuring optimal performance and safety standards are met.
Support the upkeep of facilities' grounds by assisting with basic landscaping, maintenance of outdoor equipment, and addressing minor repairs.
Manage inventory, assist in organizing storage spaces, and participate in the loading and unloading of shipments.
Take an active role in sourcing and procuring necessary supplies, parts, and equipment for the maintenance department and other areas of the company.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent. Technical or vocational training in automotive mechanics preferred.
